title: Blubrake creates electronic ABS for e-bikes, ruins those crazy cargo bike front skids
content:
It’s pretty indisputable to state that the bigger and faster a vehicle is, the better brakes it requires. As today’s electric bicycles are much heavier and faster than bicycles have ever been, so it’s no surprise Italian company Blubrake has created an ABS system for e-bikes.
